comments:
When working with eclipse which have corona plugins installed, after several hours (without restarting the Workbench) OutOfMemoryError appears.
We need to use a profiler (TPTP?) to check where the memory leaks can be.

The problem is that the memory leaks might be in 3rd party libraries (like the bug with broken images).

After some investigation, no proofs were found that the bug was caused by Corona plugins. 
It seams that bug occur only when some "stub" projects builds are performed with ant task downloading required jar files.
When I turned off that build mechanism the OutOfMemoryError did not occur anymore.

I'll keep this bug open, to check whether this is the real reason.
Decided to postpone the bug. If error occurs again, will have to reopen it.
